name: Epicurean Unicorn
description: A podcast from food industry professionals all about the food industry, food trends, and anything else we find delicious!

recent_episodes.title: Top 3 Passover Foods of the Host's Family
recent_episodes.description:
Send us a text

Our episode was invaded by two small family members sharing their favorite Passover foods. 


Find our previous bonus episode on Passover here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bonus-episode-passover/id1523500120?i=1000556376509

Send us a text

Returning guest Matthew Kaplowitz joins us for a special announcement about a new project he is working on.
